entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 09:07 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: ESE 48 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then southeast 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
